ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT ( $Permission.Update_Status_Field_on_Quote ) && ISCHANGED ( Status ) && ( ISPICKVAL ( Forecast_Type__c, "Commit" ) || ISPICKVAL ( Forecast_Type__c, "Most Likely" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Status can not be edited when the Forecast Type is Commit or Most Likely. Update Forecast Type to another value to edit Status.
